title: Study traces the origins of Chikungunya in Brazil

title_detail.value: Study traces the origins of Chikungunya in Brazil

summary: New evidence suggests that Chikungunya virus arrived in Brazil at least one year earlier than it was detected by public health surveillance systems.

summary_detail.value: New evidence suggests that Chikungunya virus arrived in Brazil at least one year earlier than it was detected by public health surveillance systems.
